Oeuvre.headline: Oeuvre
paragraphs: This profile summarizes Dylan's ongoing work in systems design, data representation, and local network development. It is written so that any host (co-op, market, directory, or personal site) can embed it without inheriting local styling.
The emphasis is on creating standardized, interoperable structures that multiple sites can share, remix, and recombine, while still allowing space for expressive, projectâ€“specific design elsewhere.
This Mycite view is the neutral, canonical representation; personal homepages and curated profiles can layer their own designs on top of the same underlying data.
